text_block_list.name: Sociable Young Man
text_block_list.text: Yesterday's 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, was a close one, wasn't it～!?

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: Rather than close, I'd say it was a valiant effort.

text_block_list.name: Sociable Young Man
text_block_list.text: Montjeu's finishing strength, that seriously isn't a joke! Who do you think could beat that!?

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: Well, in Japan, El Condor Pasa probably had the highest chance of doing that, without a doubt.

text_block_list.name: Sociable Young Man
text_block_list.text: You were always saying that, huh. El Condor Pasa is only #1 in Japan.

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: But yeah, even though I already understood that, I guess things just aren't that easy――

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: I guess #1 in Japan is only to this level.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……#1 in Japan is only……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Become! Japan's #1-～!
The week after the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 would be the 『Kyoto Daishoten』――
In preparation for that race, Special Week's training was in full swing.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa……Haa……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Spe-san, are you okay……?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, ahaha……I just messed up my pacing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ……should we take a break for now?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: No…… I'm fine. I just need to catch my breath……
She said that while smiling, maybe it was because she was out of breath, but her expression seemed stiff.
Probably because Kyoto's 2400m will be her first of that distance. While keeping the course in mind, focus on your pace and the distance.
Probably because Kyoto's 2400m will be her first of that distance. While keeping the course in mind, focus on your pace and the distance.
The 『Kyoto Daishoten』, let's stay focused as we prepare for autumn's G1s! Let's get one step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
The 『Kyoto Daishoten』, let's stay focused as we prepare for autumn's G1s! Let's get one step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: "Japan's #1"……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", and then what……?
Spe……?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, nothing……! I've calmed down a bit, so I'll go do one more lap.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (2400m……focus on pacing and the distance……)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Win the 『Kyoto Daishoten』, stay focused, prepare for autumn's G1s……)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (……And get one step closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"……)

text_block_list.name: TV Announcer
text_block_list.text: 『Japan's El Condor Pasa, she was so close…… she was so very close but was passed at the end!』

text_block_list.name: TV Announcer
text_block_list.text: 『This is the wall known as the world! El Condor Pasa is defeated and places 2nd!』

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (……Becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", what does that even mean……?)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (……A reason to run in races, what does that mean……?)

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Autumn's stage approaches, and the Uma Musume that are at the center of attention have gathered. 『Kyoto Daishoten』 GII――

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: The favorite is Special Week, along with her achievements in spring, she's garnered the support of many!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Following on, second is Mejiro Bright, and third is TM Opera O, both of whom have G1 victories adding to their popularity!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: However, don't take your eyes off this Uma Musume either! Starting in the summer, she's already made it to 4th in popularity, Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Finally, I've finally made it! A GII Race! The 『Kyoto Daishoten』!!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: All this time I've had to just watch from behind, no matter how much I wanted to run, I could only imagine it……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: But today, I will run here! A race with several G1 Uma Musume, a race with everyone, me too――

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: ……! Spe-chan!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, Tsuru-chan.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, they said Spe-chan is the favorite! You're really amazing, huh!?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: But but! I'm in great condition! For the sake of this day, I've really given it my best!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Hm……? Spe-chan……?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, no. Tsuru-chan, you really did your best, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Ehehehe, yeah!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: You see, I'm a little proud of myself that I'm able to stand here. It took a really, really long time to make it here……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: ……Alllright, show some spirit when you run, Tsuyoshi! I'll run my heart out with these G1 Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, come at me with everything you've got too! Show me what the Derby Uma Musume is made of!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah……

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: 200m remain! Special's movements seem off! Special's movements seem off!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……kuu……!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: From the inside comes Mejiro Bright!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: TM Opera O also pushes forward!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: But in the lead is Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi! Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: This is late arrival of the "Golden Generation's" hidden weapon! The one to win the [Kyoto Daishoten] is Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: 2nd place was Mejiro Bright! 3rd was TM Opera O!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: The favorite, Special Week, this is the first time she hasn't been registered on the board!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa……

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan……
